attributes.additional_details: I am an Esperanto speaker and others that I know would support this change. It is not fair to prioritise other languages over ones with more speakers.
attributes.background: Esperanto is a language spoken by hundreds of thousands worldwide. Why is a language a language like Ancient Greek even an option when it is hardly spoken. The Esperanto GCSE, discontinued in 2019, should be brought back to schools.

rejection.details: It is for schools to decide which languages they teach as part of their curriculum, and for exam boards to consider which languages have sufficient demand for a GCSE or A Level to be made available.
